 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנּוּר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Lev.26.26|Lev 26:26]]</sup> portable ==stove or fire-pot== (loan-word from Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tinûru***</u></abbr>, ***id.***, according to [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VOJ i. 23</sup> (otherwise Dvorak<sup>ZK i. 155 ff.</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, a large earthen jar, still in Syria, [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>Verhandl. d. Berl. Anthrop. Gesell., 1882, 467</sup> Whitehouse<sup>Heb.Antiq.7,3</sup> [[BDB#Kennedy|ARSK]]<sup>EB l. 605</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is loan-word from Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּנּוּרָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, and this from Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tanûra***</u></abbr>, according to [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>26</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> absolute [[Hos.7.4|Hos 7:4]] +, construct [[Gen.15.17|Gen 15:17]]; [[Ps.21.10|Ps 21:10]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנּוּרִים‎</span> [[Neh.3.11|Neh 3:11]]; [[Neh.12.38|Neh 12:38]] — ***fire-pot***, for baking (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפָה‎</span>) [[Hos.7.4|Hos 7:4]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּעֵר הֵ֑ם אֹפֵהוּ וגו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, [[BDB#Oort|Oort]]<sup>Th. Tijdschr. 1890, 480 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896), 88</sup>), compare v[[Hos.7.6|Hos 7:6]] v[[Hos.7.7|Hos 7:7]] (all in simile), [[Exod.7.28|Exod 7:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Lev.2.4|Lev 2:4]]; [[Lev.7.9|Lev 7:9]]; [[Lev.26.26|Lev 26:26]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), also (breakable) [[Lev.11.35|Lev 11:35]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׁן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Gen.15.17|Gen 15:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) in vision, symbol of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s presence, compare [[Isa.31.9|Isa 31:9]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוּר‎</span>); simile of heat [[Lam.5.10|Lam 5:10]], of judgment [[Mal.3.19|Mal 3:19]], and so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Ps.21.10|Ps 21:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגְדַּל הַתַּנּוּרִים‎</span> [[Neh.3.11|Neh 3:11]]; [[Neh.12.38|Neh 12:38]] a tower on wall of Jerusalem [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנְחוּם‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנְחוּמוֺת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנְחֻ֫מֶת‎</span> see [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נחם‎</span>].
